sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the effect of deep hypothermic circulatory arrest on lung protection in pig model.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究乳猪模型深低温停循环的肺保护作用。

sentences.english: Food like roasted suckling pig, steamed chicken, fruit and wine are offered during the ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 食物一样，只烧乳猪，清蒸鸡，水果和酒者在。

sentences.english: Roast suckling pig is the most famous speciality of Cantonese food.
sentences.chinese: 烤乳猪是最有名的广东特色菜。

sentences.english: A hungry person in Bali may want mangoes, suckling pig, and beans.
sentences.chinese: 在巴黎饥饿的人可能要芒果，乳猪，和豆类。

sentences.english: You can alternate sucking with soft licking with the tip of your tongue.
sentences.chinese: 您可以候补委员，乳猪与软舔与提示你的舌头。

sentences.english: The famous specialities of these two are roast suckling pig and roast Beijing duck.
sentences.chinese: 这两种菜系的著名特色菜分别是烤乳猪和北京烤鸭。

sentences.english: Affected by the financial tsunami, some grave- sweepers opted for paper suckling pigs as offerings.
sentences.chinese: 受金融海啸影响，有扫墓者选择纸乳猪祭品。

sentences.english: Now baste the skin with butter, and roast a further 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在乳猪皮上再次涂上牛油，焗15分钟。

sentences.english: Despite this place being famous for their suckling pig, the roast goose is flavorful inside and out.
sentences.chinese: 这家店虽然以乳猪著称，烧鹅却做得十分入味。

sentences.english: We serve some typical Cantonese food today, such as Roast Sucking Pig and seafood in casserole.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天有一些广东特色菜，如烤乳猪和砂锅海鲜。

sentences.english: I started thinking about this last year when I had a pig roast at my house.
sentences.chinese: 去年在家吃烤乳猪时，我开始思考这方面的问题。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method of cultivation large scale liver parenchyma and noparenchyma cells and to form the porcine hepatocyte spheroids.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立乳猪肝细胞与非实质细胞大量聚集培养技术。

sentences.english: Our restaurant specializes in roasted suckling pig.
sentences.chinese: 我们的特色菜是烤乳猪。

sentences.english: Baste the pig with more fat and continue to roast at high temperature for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在乳猪上添加更多油脂，继续以高温烤焗10分钟。

sentences.english: Except roasts the sheep, the roasting pig is also the Spanish vegetable one certainly.
sentences.chinese: 除了烤羊，烤乳猪也是西班牙菜一绝。

definition: Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
